turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey get serious stomach pain and wahala after I chop leftover rice yesterday.
turns.user_input: Well, I'm sorry to hear that.

turns.ai_line: Na so, doctor. E get as my belle dey do me since I chop the rice. I dey feel like make I vomit, and I don run go toilet like two times this morning. Wetin you think fit be the problem?
